request.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of espresso and frothy milk in every sip of our classic cappuccino.
request.name: Cappuccino

request.description: Savor the smooth and creamy texture of our latte, made with freshly brewed espresso and steamed milk.
request.name: Latte

request.description: Experience the vibrant green tea flavors of our matcha latte, a perfect blend of matcha powder and steamed milk.
request.name: Matcha Latte

request.description: Our refreshing smoothie is a delicious blend of fruits and yogurt, perfect for a quick and healthy treat.
request.name: Smoothie

request.description: Enjoy the comforting warmth of our tea, made by steeping the finest dried tea leaves in hot water.
request.name: Tea

request.description: Kickstart your day with the bold and intense flavors of our espresso, made with finely ground coffee beans and hot water.
request.name: Espresso

request.description: Indulge in the rich and velvety smoothness of our hot chocolate, made with cocoa powder, sugar, and steamed milk.
request.name: Hot Chocolate

request.description: Cool off with our refreshing iced coffee, served over ice for a perfect summer drink.
request.name: Iced Coffee

request.description: Beat the heat with our refreshing iced tea, available in a variety of flavors to suit your taste buds.
request.name: Iced Tea

request.description: Stay hydrated with our refreshing water, essential for maintaining your well-being.
request.name: Water
